Container.Name: ClipCascade
Container.Overview: Automatically sync your clipboard across multiple devices, no key press required. Ensures seamless clipboard sharing between devices, prioritizing privacy with end-to-end encryption. [br] See documentation for set-up details: https://github.com/Sathvik-Rao/ClipCascade

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 8080

Config.Name: Database - Driver
Config.Description: The database driver. Default uses H2 file mode. Example for PostgreSQL: org.postgresql.Driverset

Config.Name: Database - Dialect
Config.Description: The database dialect. Default uses H2 file mode. Example for PostgreSQL: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect

Config.Name: Database - URL
Config.Description: The database URL. Default uses H2 file mode. Example for PostgreSQL: jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/clipcascade

Config.Name: Database - Username
Config.Description: The database username. Default uses H2 file mode. Once set, you must use the same username whenever you migrate the database.

Config.Name: Database - Password

Config.Description: Sets a password for encrypting the user database. Once set, you must use the same password whenever you migrate the database. Pattern: FILE_PASSWORD USER_PASSWORD

Config.Name: Allow Signups
Config.Description: Toggle to enable or disable the signup feature/page for public users.

Config.Name: Max Accounts
Config.Description: Sets the maximum number of user accounts that can be created on the server. Set to -1 for unlimited.

Config.Name: Enable Donations
Config.Description: Enables or disables the donations feature.

Config.Name: External Broker - Enable
Config.Description: Enables or disables the external STOMP broker feature for P2S mode.

Config.Name: External Broker - Host
Config.Description: The external STOMP broker URL for P2S mode.

Config.Name: External Broker - Port
Config.Description: The external STOMP broker port for P2S mode.

Config.Name: External Broker - Username
Config.Description: The external STOMP broker username for P2S mode.

Config.Name: External Broker - Password
Config.Description: The external STOMP broker password for P2S mode.

Config.Name: Inactive Account Purge Time
Config.Description: Purge/delete inactive accounts after a specified number of seconds. Set to -1 to disable this feature.

Config.Name: Max Message Size
Config.Description: Maximum message size, in bytes. Recommend less than 25 for desktop, approx. 1 for mobile

Config.Name: Enable Peer-To-Peer
Config.Description: This feature decrease the load on the server and allows unlimited data transfer. If enabled, the Max Message Size value is ignored. NOTE: Some networks may not support Peer-to-Peer.

Config.Name: P2P STUN URL
Config.Description: STUN server URL for Peer-to-Peer connections. Required if P2P is enabled. Only change if you know what this is.

Config.Name: Allowed Origins
Config.Description: Specifies which domains are allowed to connect to the WebSocket (CORS policy). Replace with your domain. If not set, all origins are allowed by default, which may be less secure.

Config.Name: Session Timeout
Config.Description: Sets the session timeout duration.

Config.Name: Brute Force Protection - Max Unique IPs
Config.Description: The maximum number of attempts from different IP addresses before an account is blocked for a given timeout.

Config.Name: Brute Force Protection - Max Attempts Per IP
Config.Description: The maximum number of attempts per IP address before blocking the IP address for a given timeout and will scale if continued.

Config.Name: Brute Force Protection - Timeout
Config.Description: The lockout timeout for failed login attempts.

Config.Name: Brute Force Protection - Timeout Scaling
Config.Description: The scaling factor for the lockout timeout. Determines how the lockout duration increases with each repeated failed attempt.

Config.Name: Brute Force Protection - Tracker Cache
Config.Description: Enables or disables caching for the BFA tracker. If enabled, the server caches BFA tracker data in memory and disk.

Config.Name: Brute Force Protection - Tracker Cache Max Entries
Config.Description: The maximum number of entries in the BFA tracker cache (JVM RAM).

Config.Name: Brute Force Protection - Tracker Cache RAM Percentage
Config.Description: The percentage of the BFA tracker cache allocated to off-heap RAM.

Config.Name: Brute Force Protection - Tracker Cache Disk Percentage
Config.Description: The percentage of the BFA tracker cache allocated to disk storage.

Config.Name: Brute Force Protection - Tracker Logging
Config.Description: Enables or disables logging of the BFA tracker.

Config.Name: Logging Level
Config.Description: Sets the logging level for the server.

Config.Name: Log Retention
Config.Description: The maximum number of days to retain server logs.

Config.Name: Log Capacity
Config.Description: The maximum capacity of server logs.

Config.Name: Internal Server Port
Config.Description: Internal port for the server. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Database Path
Config.Description: Path to the database fi5259600000mle

Config.Name: Logs Path
Config.Description: Path to the logs directory
